page.title: 05AGRICULTURAL SUPPLIERS
page.content: { Morris, Wargent & Wilde}is an agricultural suppliers on the Worcester road. This firm has been established since 1920, and has been on this site for 12-15 years. The firm employs appriximately 50 people, who work a 40 hour week from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. each day for Â£100. Sometimes, in harvest time, they work on a Saturday morning. M,W&W sell to various size farms and also gardeneres (as they supply lawnmowers etc.). The machinery they sell comes from many firms, but mostly Massey Fergusson. They sell to over 1000 customers, who buy{combine harvesters, {silage makers, sprayers, tractors, {bailers etc. The busiest times of the year are September, April and March. At the moment,in 1985, business is very good.
